attributes.title: horrible app, too many issues to count
attributes.review: it took 5 hours to download, literally, and when i opened it it took another 23 minutes to load. it repeatedly froze and closed on its own. horrible app, do not recommend one bit.

attributes.title: It’s a demon
attributes.review: As soon as I got the app from the man I thought was my lord and savior, my son came out as trans and proceeded to cut off his pp, and now my bloodline will cease to exist. I think Trump is the anti christ.

attributes.title: absolutely horrible
attributes.review: I thought this would be an app to help educate myself on Trump. Turns out the app is extremly poorly built and it smells bad. Total disgrace to America.

attributes.title: I got sick
attributes.review: This app made me very ill that I threw up soo much. It also made my dog and my cat throw up. This app also made my grandma walk away (she is in a wheelchair)

attributes.title: THE WORST
attributes.review: Your app keeps glitching like what goes on hun? All this money for such a glitchy app, fix it immediately! And while you’re at it stan loona 🤟🏼

attributes.title: What the hell
attributes.review: I hate this app it is so awful and crap don’t get it is  so bad and I would never do it again ohh my goodness

attributes.title: no❤️
attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE it takes along time to download would NOT recommend downloading this app

attributes.title: THIS TOOK 3 HOURS TO DOWNLOAD!
attributes.review: I tried to download this app but it took 3 hours to download!!!! 😡And I have Pretty good wi-Fi where I live. I do not suggest downloading this app anyone who is looking into it!

attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: The app was terrible, first the glitching and the welcoming . WOW. Terrible. And then with the picture of a racist burnt Cheeto. NO thank you. As well as I quote “ Make America great again “ no. What are you making great ?

attributes.title: Absolutely horrible
attributes.review: This app is the worst It is very laggy and I just don’t like say whatever you want but it’s garbage
